channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hit The Road
channel.desc: To truly enjoy Gunma, travel by car is key. We start from Takasaki, where the bullet train stops, and make our way to Kusatsu hot springs, with world Heritage sites and local food along the way.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Chatroom Japan
channel.desc: Chatroom Japan puts a spotlight on our diverse international community. We report on the issues, speak to those involved, and get a fresh look at what it's like to live in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Today's Close Up
channel.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Natural And Cultual Delights
channel.desc: * Broadcast only --- Journeys in Japan's National Parks: We visit Daisetsuzan National Park and Amamigunto National Park, exploring their rich natural beauty and unique culture nurtured by the people who live there.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Today's theme: Shifting Perspectives. A growing trend offers new perspectives to spark new discoveries and realizations. Discover a host of designs that remind us that shifting perspectives matters.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Asia Insight
channel.desc: A school in Mae Sot, Thailand, located just across the border with Myanmar, shelters immigrant children of all ages, providing education to many who face the effects of poverty or the civil war.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Ashikari Seiya explores the potential of crickets as a nutritious solution to the global food crisis. He works with farmers in Cambodia to establish green, sustainable production methods.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Today's Close Up
channel.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Inaba Mototaka is a doctor with the international NGO Peace Winds Japan and the leader of its airborne emergency response team, ARROWS. He talks about providing medical care in disaster areas.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Beauty Of Japanese Swords: Famous Masterpieces
channel.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, two towering reputations are brought together in one truly special blade: Kaishu Kotetsu.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Biologic drugs, made mainly from antibodies, have transformed the approach to treating chronic inflammatory diseases such as asthma and rheumatoid arthritis. We explore their mechanisms and potential.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: smokeless grills.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at the significance of cats in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Today's theme: Shifting Perspectives. A growing trend offers new perspectives to spark new discoveries and realizations. Discover a host of designs that remind us that shifting perspectives matters.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Story Land
channel.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries. Watch out, too, for the delightful illustrations.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time And Tide
channel.desc: Clad in shining gold, Kinkakuji stands out even in Kyoto. What inspired the samurai who built this stunning temple.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: The Maki-e lacquering technique uses gold dust on a jet-black background to dazzling effect.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Restoring A Religious Tradition At Mt. Hiko
channel.desc: Yamabushi are religious ascetics who undergo rigorous training in the mountains. Their practices were outlawed 150 years ago. Now, one adherent is attempting to breathe new life into this tradition.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Museum Japan
channel.desc: Okayama / Hara Kenya (graphic designer) Hara visits a Japanese propeller maker with a 30% global market share, to discover the merit of finding an object's perfect shape, without compromise.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Shinobu: Somebody Hear My Voice
channel.desc: Sakamoto Shinobu was poisoned by mercury while in her mother's womb and has been suffering from Minamata disease since birth. We look back on the life of 68-year-old Shinobu and listen to her message.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Railway Kingdom Japan: The Shinkansen's Punctual Perfection
channel.desc: The shinkansen: world-renowned for exceptional on-time performance. We explore the highly skilled drivers and equipment that make it possible, through history and into a future of self-driving trains.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time And Tide
channel.desc: Clad in shining gold, Kinkakuji stands out even in Kyoto. What inspired the samurai who built this stunning temple.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: The Maki-e lacquering technique uses gold dust on a jet-black background to dazzling effect.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Today's theme: Shifting Perspectives. A growing trend offers new perspectives to spark new discoveries and realizations. Discover a host of designs that remind us that shifting perspectives matters.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Story Land
channel.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries. Watch out, too, for the delightful illustrations.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Train Cruise
channel.desc: Travel the Soya Line through the northern part of the island to Wakkanai, Japan's northernmost station. Disused trains lines and stations remain along the way. Head to Cape Soya and gaze at Sakhalin.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: In 2018, Okayama Prefecture's town of Mabi was severely damaged by flooding from heavy rain and many people died in their homes. We'll examine new measures being taken to combat home flooding.

channel.desc: The proactive science education program which encourages primary and lower secondary school children to discover and investigate the mysteries which puzzle them.

channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Wild Hokkaido!
channel.desc: A vast expanse of drift ice spanning the frigid Sea of Okhotsk in the World Natural Heritage site of Shiretoko, sets the stage for a variety of novel winter adventures.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Amami: Island Colors
channel.desc: Experience the colors of Amami Oshima in beautiful time-lapse footage. Unique hues include "Amami Blue" ocean waters and the glossy black of silk thread that's painstakingly dyed using wood and mud.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: J Melo
channel.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: singer-songwriter Kitamura Fuki, whose work ranges from piano-and-vocals to DJ sets; and 12-member Dreamers Union Choir, who bring powerful vocal harmonies.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: Women-only trips and solo camping are some of the many ways that people enjoy camping in Japan. Camping can even serve as a method of preparing for disaster. We examine its increasing popularity.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Story Land In Classical Japanese
channel.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Kyoto City University of Arts, founded in 1880, has produced leading painters in the art world. Its policy emphasizes Shasei: painting from life through intensive observation.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Zero Waste Life
channel.desc: Nakajima Deco is obsessed with finding ways to live a waste-free life. Diners at her cafe are served vegetables - peels, leaves and all - conveying the value of life through her cooking.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Neo Japonism
channel.desc: Japanese Vocaloid culture has taken the world by storm, sparking a global fan base and inspiring a new generation of artists. Watch and learn about this technology and how it unleashes creativity.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Broadcasters' Eye
channel.desc: High school students in the Amami Islands interviewing elderly residents who experienced the return of the islands from American rule to Japan after WWII and are working to pass on their stories.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Story Land In Classical Japanese

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-14.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: Furano is full of vast wheat fields. For a local farmer's cat, it's the perfect place to hunt or go for a run. We meet two cats who live at an inn and love to play on the exposed hot water pipes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ramen Japan
channel.desc: Enjoy local ramen born in the big city! Don't miss the ramen stall that's trending worldwide on social media.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Today: explaining when there's been a misunderstanding. Bima Aji Nugroho, from Indonesia, works at a metalworking company in Saitama Prefecture. He worries about problems due to miscommunication.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
channel.desc: In northern Niigata, we'll see the old ways of living as we harvest daikon radish, go gill fishing, see cat houses made from rice straw, and a lovely old lacquer craft.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Take Tech
channel.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Nagasaka Mago makes art with discarded smartphones, computers, and other e-waste from the slums of Ghana, then uses much of the proceeds to give back to the community. He talks about his vision.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: In 2018, Okayama Prefecture's town of Mabi was severely damaged by flooding from heavy rain and many people died in their homes. We'll examine new measures being taken to combat home flooding.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: Every summer, several typhoons approach Japan and make landfall. By understanding the way they move and the power of their rainstorms, we can learn how to protect ourselves and our possessions.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese
channel.desc: #39 I lost my wallet. / To explain that you did something you didn't intend to, use the "te" form of a verb, and add "shite shimaimashita." So, "otosu" (to drop) becomes "otoshite shimaimashita.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: On this episode, we revisit Filipino dance instructor Eduardo Macarat in Yokohama who changed his career to support his family, and Hongkonger Tom Wong who promotes shiitake mushrooms grown in Iwate.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Activate Your Japanese!
channel.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: We introduce a documentary program exploring Japanese Ig Nobel laureates and the serious aims and stories behind their humorous, thought-provoking research.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hometown Stories
channel.desc: Stories about people, stories about life. Intimate portraits of people from around Japan, each leading diverse lives while enriching lives of others.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: Gojinjo Taiko is a wild, powerful performance by masked drummers. It originated 400 years ago, when villagers disguised themselves as oni (demons) to scare away a warlord's army.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Ishikawa Junya provides trailers with flush toilets to areas hit by natural disasters. He talks to us about sustainable disaster relief, and the importance of networks.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: Will Sparks Fly?
channel.desc: A dapper young man sits in a teahouse with his older companion when a young woman catches his eye. From the way they're looking at each other, it's clear that there's something going on between them.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Hisayama Town in southern Japan has held health checkups since the 1960s. Using this data, Kyushu University identified two markers linked to early dementia. We present the latest findings.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: On this episode, we revisit Filipino dance instructor Eduardo Macarat in Yokohama who changed his career to support his family, and Hongkonger Tom Wong who promotes shiitake mushrooms grown in Iwate.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Activate Your Japanese!
channel.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: We introduce a documentary program exploring Japanese Ig Nobel laureates and the serious aims and stories behind their humorous, thought-provoking research.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hometown Stories
channel.desc: Stories about people, stories about life. Intimate portraits of people from around Japan, each leading diverse lives while enriching lives of others.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dig More Japan
channel.desc: In Japan's aging society, lifestyle choices that promote health and longevity are the new norm. We dig a little deeper.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: In 2018, Okayama Prefecture's town of Mabi was severely damaged by flooding from heavy rain and many people died in their homes. We'll examine new measures being taken to combat home flooding.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Hisayama Town in southern Japan has held health checkups since the 1960s. Using this data, Kyushu University identified two markers linked to early dementia. We present the latest findings.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Elisabeth Llopis explores Nishio (Aichi), a historic town that is one of Japan's largest producers of matcha.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: For 25 years, Kamijo Yoko has been engaging with Palestinian painters and children. In May 2024, she held an exhibition of their artwork in Japan. She talks about her connection to the Gaza Strip.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: The Star Festival
channel.desc: For the annual Tanabata Star Festival, families across Edo flew bamboo stalks adorned with strips of paper and ornaments representing wishes. We examine what their wishes tell us about their lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef
channel.desc: Chef Saito's authentic recipes: (1) Chilled Ramen Noodles (2) Chilled Tofu. Learn about Japanese home cooking, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Document 72 Hours
channel.desc: A discount women's clothing store in Ueno, Tokyo. The shop attracts customers for many reasons. We spent 3 days listening to their stories.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: To realize a sustainable society, large wooden buildings are being created around the world. Japan's revolutionary "unburning wood" now contributes greatly to possibilities for wooden architecture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Elisabeth Llopis explores Nishio (Aichi), a historic town that is one of Japan's largest producers of matcha.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Deeper Look
channel.desc: An experienced anchor Del Irani has a cutting-edge dialogue with a first-class guest on a current-affairs topics.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
channel.desc: Featured recipe: Beef with Kombu Dashi Sauce Learn about Japanese home cooking with Master Chef Saito, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques in five minutes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: lotion tissues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Kitayama Yasuo is a master gardener, specializing in rock gardens. His final project is in a city devastated by a tsunami. His goal is to create a garden where people can heal, through love for life.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: To realize a sustainable society, large wooden buildings are being created around the world. Japan's revolutionary "unburning wood" now contributes greatly to possibilities for wooden architecture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Kabuki Kool
channel.desc: Actor Kataoka Ainosuke explores a kabuki dance in which two actors play a total of eight different roles featuring Tokyo's famous Sanja Festival.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dive In Tokyo
channel.desc: We visit Shibaura on the edge of Tokyo Bay and unravel its transformation from a maritime hub to a town of high-rise condos. Throughout its history, it has played a key role in Tokyo's development.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Kimura Masahiko is a legend of the bonsai world who has won the Prime Minister's Award, one of the industry's highest honors, 27 times. He talks about creating original works that break the mold.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsline Asia 24
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Herbal Symphony
channel.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
channel.desc: Enoki are the most produced mushroom in Japan. The thin, white mushrooms are a staple ingredient in hot pot dishes. Check out amazing cultivation methods and feast your eyes on some unique recipes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: This episode introduces two aquaculture companies that have turned to new types of fish to overcome challenges in their quest for sustainable seafood production.
